Initializer# init(interval:frequency:weeklyRecurrenceDays:)

iOS 14.0+iPadOS 14.0+Mac Catalyst 14.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 7.0+

```
init(
    interval: Int,
    frequency: INRecurrenceFrequency,
    weeklyRecurrenceDays: INDayOfWeekOptions = []
)
```
